name: Takane Game Collab Demo
description:
A game where you can headpat Takane, feed her cucumbers, and do some activities to get more cards.

For now, only ONE MINIGAME is playable. More will come in future updates.

Version 0.1.0 :
- Added Yamawaro Jump minigame

Known Bugs :
- Music doesnt play again after game over
- picking up a second cucumber used to crash the game. temporary fix is added so that the second cucumber picked up will return to the box. needs actual bugfix later

To-do:
-change the cloud platforms to something else less punishing
-add boulders to mash through, and slowmo for important sections of drilling
-add more sound effects
-add victory music
-add quick restart button for minigames
